devdoc.author: Jesus Badillo Jr.

addPriceFeed(address,string).details: Add a priceFeed to the contract

params._newPriceFeed: the address of the priceFeed to be able to get information from the chainlink oracle
params._newPriceFeedName: the name corresponding to the priceFeed passed into the contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removePriceFeed(address).details: Remove a priceFeed from the contract

params._priceFeed: the address of the priceFeed to be able to get information from the chainlink oracle

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ForexPrices: a smart contract that lists the PriceFeeds of multiple tokens,forex, and commodoties
